item.title: SVEX-1301HD IP Explosion Proof PTZ camera; 1.3Mpx, stainless 304 housing, 18X optical zoom
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description:
• Advanced EX-proof CCTV Equipment
  • 304 or 316L Stainless Steel Material
  • 1.3 Megapixels also Available in 2 Megapixels
  • Multiple IP camera support
  • 10M/100M Network Interface
  • 360° Pan Continuous Rotation
  • +90°~-90° Rotation Speed
  • Indoor/Outdoor Installation for All Weather Use
  • IP-68
  • Wall Mount and Base Mount
item.content:encoded:
SVEX-1301HD explosion proof IP PTZ camera is integrated with traditional explosion proof PTZ housing and IP camera. Such prod- uct is the right choice for CCTV requirement in hazardous area both for explosive gas and dust atmosphere.

Pan, tilt, IP camera and receiver are integrated with multiple communication protocol and baud rate

100~240VAC power supply

Height 61.7000
18x Optical Zoom 16895.00
20x Optical Zoom 17330.00 (2 Megapixels)
36x Optical Zoom n/a
Resolution 1280 x 960
Image Sensor 1/3” Sony Progressive Scan CCD
Illumination 0.1Lux (color); 0.01Lux (B/W)
Lens 18x optical, 12x digital; F1.6~2.8
Digital Zoom 18x
Operating Temperature -40°F ~ +140°F (-40°C ~ +60°C)
Heater Included Auto Heat, Work at 14°F (-10°C)
Material Stainless steel 304 or 316L
IP Rating IP-68
Pan 360° continuous pan rotation
Tilt -90°~ +90°
Pan Speed 0.1°/S ~ 40°/S
Tilt Speed 0.1°/S ~ 40°/S
Mounting Type Base mount or wall mount
Datasheets Yes
Videos No

The dome can do 360° continuous pan rotation and pan and tilt rotation speed are variable from 0.1°/s to 40°/s, which is easy to capture the fast moving objective.

128 preset positions, including pan, tilt and lens position. Electro-polish ﬁnish or corrosion proof painting ﬁnish optional. Wiper, heater and sun shield is equipped.

ITEM SVEX-1301HD
Brand Hikivision
Mode DS-2DZ216MF
Sensor 1/3″ Sony Progressive Scan CCD
Pixel 1280(H)x960(V)
Min. lux. 0.1Lux (color); 0.01Lux (B/W)
White balance Auto/Manual/Auto track/Indoor/Outdoor
Gain control Auto/Manual
S/N ratio > 50dB
BLC ON/OFF
Electric shutter 1/25~1/100,000s
D/N mode ICR IR filter
Lens 18x optical, 12x digital; F1.6~2.8
Horizontal Angle 3.2~55.2 °
Video compression H.264
Frame rate 50HZ: 12.5 fps (1280×960),25fps (1280×720)

60HZ: 15 fps (1280×960),24fps (1280×720)
Video stream 32Kbps~8Mbps
ITEM SVEX-1301HD
Input voltage 100~240VAC, 50/60Hz
Current ＜1A
Power Supply 100w
Network interface 10M/100M
Preset 128
Preset accuracy ≤0.1°
Auto-heat Work at -10° C
Cable connection 11-core composite cable, 3 meters

3-core for power and 8-core for data
